ack.p: We gratefully acknowledge financial support from the UK Department for Health and Social Care (SBRI Vaccines for Global Epidemics—Clinical Contract−971555 A Nipah vaccine to eliminate porcine reservoirs and safeguard human health) and our consortium partners: Dalan Bailey, Elma Tchilian, Miriam Pedrera and Nazia Thakur, The Pirbright Institute, UK; Teresa Lambe and Sarah Gilbert, Jenner Institute, University of Oxford, UK; Glenn Marsh, CSIRO Health and Biosecurity, Australia; Keith Chappell, Daniel Watterson and Paul Young, University of Queensland, Australia; Li-Yen Chang, University of Malaya, Malaysia; Nagendra Nath Barman, Assam Agricultural University, India; and Rüdiger Raue, Zoetis, Belgium.
